message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,750,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it holds for you.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $1,250,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your position, but $1,250,000 is significantly lower than what I need to make this deal work.  I'm willing to come down to $1,600,000. This is a good price for both of us. Let's make this happen.

Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I still believe the product is worth less than $1,600,000 to me. My counteroffer is $1,500,000. I hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
